title: Looking for script similar to "Principino" Italian Art Deco chocolate logo
content:
I found this in Steven Heller & Louise Fili's book _Euro Deco_. Is there a digital face similar to this anywhere?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/principino_6483.png)
author: BradB

comments.content:
Based on the age, it's most likely hand-designed. [Orion Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102539/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000003#specimen) comes close.

- Lex

I don't know an exact match, but [Adonis Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102539/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/adonis-old-style-sg/) and [Artemesia](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108102539/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptSmall4/artemisia.gif) have a similar connecting style.

- Mike Yanega
Yeah, Adonis is pretty close in many ways, probably closer to some other "cursive" samples in the book. Thanks for introducing me to Orion. It has a similar feel.
